name: Kill Them With Cuteness
description:
Kill Them With Cuteness is a Semi-open world 3D Platformer where Aliens have invaded, and the only way to stop them is through cute animals! Collect pets, help the island residents, find the Aliens and KILL THEM WITH CUTENESS!!!

EXPLORE AND COLLECT AN ARSENAL OF PETS


Collect different pets across the island, and use them against the Alien horde!

HELP THE LOCALS, MAKE FRIENDS


You're not alone in your journey to defeat the Aliens, help the local islanders with their problems and they'll help you out in return!

THE WORLD'S FIRST CUTE'EM'UP



Aliens immune to everything except the power of exploding cute animals
